alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE, SOUTHERN PICKAWAY AND NORTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Greenfield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Circleville, Williamsport, New Holland, Logan Elm Village, Good Hope, Frankfort, Fox, Clarksburg, Aw Marion State Park, Austin, Pickaway County Airport, Rock Mills and Plano. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
